plaster.title: Lime Plaster
plaster.description: Lime plaster is a durable and breathable material that provides a natural finish. It helps regulate indoor humidity, preventing mold growth and creating a healthy living environment. Its timeless aesthetics add charm and character to any space.

microcement.title: Microcement
microcement.description: Microcement is a contemporary and durable surface finish that creates a smooth and elegant result. It's an ideal choice for both walls and floors, offering a waterproof and wear-resistant solution that fits perfectly into modern interiors.

insulation.title: Hemp Wool Insulation
insulation.description: Hemp wool insulation is an ecological and effective insulation solution. It provides excellent thermal insulation, regulates moisture, and is fully recyclable. Additionally, it is fire-resistant and resistant to pests.
